sections.title: Menu Type List Help
sections.intro: The Menu Type List page allows you to manage different menu categories (e.g., Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner) for your system.

features.title: Viewing Current Menus
features.description: All existing menu types are listed with names and action buttons

features.title: Creating New Menu Types
features.description: Add new menu categories to your system

features.title: Editing Menu Types
bullets: Click Edit button next to menu

features.title: Deleting Menu Types
bullets: Click Delete button next to menu

notes.title: Validation Rules
bullets: Cannot delete menus with associated items

sections.title: Create Menu Type Help
sections.intro: The Create Menu Type page allows you to manage different types of menu items and link them to menu categories.

features.title: Viewing Current Menu Types
features.description: All menu types listed with name, price, and associated menu

features.title: Creating New Menu Types
features.description: Add new menu types to your system

features.title: Editing Menu Types
bullets: Click Edit button next to menu type
Update name, price, or menu association

features.title: Deleting Menu Types
bullets: Click Delete button next to menu type

notes.title: Requirements
bullets: Cannot delete types with associated items

sections.title: Create Category Help
sections.intro: The Create Category page allows you to manage categories for menu items (e.g., Appetizers, Main Course).

features.title: Viewing Current Categories
features.description: All categories listed with names and action buttons

features.title: Creating New Categories
features.description: Add new item categories to your system

features.title: Editing Categories
bullets: Click Edit button next to category

features.title: Deleting Categories
bullets: Click Delete button next to category

notes.title: Best Practices
bullets: Verify no items are assigned before deleting

sections.title: Create Item Help
sections.intro: The Create Item page allows you to manage individual menu items (e.g., 'Chicken Curry', 'Fried Rice').

features.title: Viewing Current Items
features.description: All menu items listed with names and action buttons

features.title: Creating New Items
features.description: Add new dishes to your menu

features.title: Editing Items
bullets: Click Edit button next to item

features.title: Deleting Items
bullets: Click Delete button next to item

notes.title: Validation Rules
bullets: Cannot delete items assigned to categories

sections.title: Category Menu Type Help
sections.intro: The Create Category Menu Type page allows you to link menu types with categories and set item limits.

features.title: Editing Associations
bullets: Click Edit button next to association
Update menu type, category, or item limit

features.title: Deleting Associations
bullets: Click Delete button next to association

notes.title: Usage Tips
bullets: Item limit controls how many items can be selected
Use this to create package options
Set higher limits for broader categories

sections.title: Menu Overview Help

features.title: Navigating Menu Structure
bullets: Expand menu lists to see types

notes.title: Client Presentation Tips
bullets: Use this view to showcase options to clients

sections.title: Item-Category Association Help
sections.intro: The Create Item Category Menu Type page allows you to associate menu items with specific category menu types.

features.title: Creating Associations
bullets: Select menu item and category-menu type

features.title: Editing Associations
bullets: Select new menu item or category

features.title: Filtering Associations
bullets: Use dropdowns to filter by menu type or category

notes.title: Rules
bullets: Each item can only be in one category per menu type
Cannot associate items to incompatible categories
